Senior Software Engineer

About the Role:
We are looking for a Senior Software Engineer to join our team. You will be responsible for designing and implementing distributed systems that handle millions of requests per day.

Responsibilities:
- Design and implement scalable distributed systems
- Lead technical initiatives and mentor junior engineers
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams
- Ensure system reliability and performance

Requirements:
- 5+ years of experience with Go
- Experience building distributed systems
- Strong problem-solving skills
- Experience with Kubernetes preferred
- Knowledge of microservices architecture

Nice to Have:
- Experience with cloud infrastructure
- Previous startup experience
- Experience with monitoring and observability tools
